mapper.select: SELECT u.user_seq AS userSeq , u.user_id AS userId , u.user_name AS userName , u.user_pwd AS userPwd , u.reg_date AS regDate , uh.user_seq AS userSeq , TO_CHAR(uh.birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS birth , uh.email , uh.tel FROM user1 u LEFT JOIN user_history uh ON uh.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
